transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Hello. Haan ji Rajeev ji, Sony bol rahi hu IndiaMART se. Good evening. Maine aapko na ek concern raise kiya tha to isme dekhiye aapka isme mujhe activity dikha raha hai aapne kafi sare not relevant mark kare team ne ye share kiya hai. Aapne kam se kam not relevant. Aapke yahan se na hamari team ne jab maine aapke concern raise kiya ki aapke pass koi lead dikh nahi rahi hai aur aapke pass wahan pe wo lead bahut sari jo portal pe aayi hai but visible bhi nahi ho pa rahi hai aapke perment pe. To aapke jo irrelevant bucket hai na irrelevant bucket mein aapki team ne ya fir aapne sabse jyada bylead not relevant mark kari hai is month mein 143 bylead not relevant mark kari hai November ke mahine mein. Wo bylead kaun kaun si hai?
Executive: Ye bylead matlab form se to nahi hai mujhe ek sath number of data dikh raha hai aur aapne na usme galat reason se mark kar diya hai.
Customer: Kya bata rahe hain?
Executive: Jute aa rahe the, shoes aa rahe the, football aa rahe the wo sab hum karte hi nahi hai to hum not relevantly aap hi ke yahan se bola gaya tha.
Customer: To aapne galat bucket pe mark kara hai wahi to keh rahi hu aapne usme kya kiya hai others mein ja kar ke mark kar diya hai to kahin aisa to nahi hai ki aapne jo lead iski bhi thi kuch unko aapne others mein mark kar diya hai galti se.
Executive: Nahi nahi nahi. Nahi aisa aisa nahi bhai aapko agar wo dikh raha hai aap ek bar wo irrelevant mein 143 dekhiye ki usme se ek bhi gym setup service ka to wo hoga hi nahi. Piche shoes ke bahut aa rahe the to us samay Mahima madam ne hi bola tha ki aap jo aapke jo kaam ki nahi hai usko irrelevant hai. Not relevant kar diya kijiye.
Customer: Haan lekin aapne bucket usme na others dala hai. Others ki jagah pe aapke pass option ek na wrong product hum dete hain. To aap usko select kar sakte the.
Executive: Wo wo cheez utna pata nahi na to usse usse hi cheez ko kya fark padna chahiye.
Customer: Usse unhone baat yehi thi wahan pe unhone ye mention kara tha ki kafi sare not relevant mark hue hain jis vajah se wahan pe jo relevant categories hain unki jo relevant product hai uski bhi kafi lead usme mark hui hai not relevant. Aisa unhone mention kiya tha. To jis vajah se aapke pass kafi leads visible nahi ho rahi hai. Aur aapke aisa aisa kuch bhi nahi hai unko boliye ki aap mere ko 10 dikha dijiye agar 143 hai usme se 10 mujhe dikha dijiye ki ek gym setup service ki not relevant mention.
Customer: Achcha. Aur isme aapka na overall jo product bhi added hai jo score hota hai ek visibility ka score to aapke product score mein bhi overall 54% score hai. 80 plus hona chahiye score but yahan pe 54 hai to aapke kuch product jo hai unme bhi score hume thoda sa badhana padega. Badhane ke liye to kuch product addition karna padega ya material mein yani ki photo ho gaya ya fir wahan pe aapke kuch product ka specification ya to details mein description jo bhi missing area hai. Jyadatar aapka specification hi missing mujhe dikh raha hai. To wo hum add karna padega usse bhi unhone likha hai ki thoda aapka wahan pe boost hoga jo direct inquiries aati hai wo aapke boost ho jayengi. To aapko main ek bar na thoda share kar deti hu kuch product ka agar aapke pass detail ho to aap bhej dena nahi to main apni taraf se dekhti hu ki kya addition hum kar sakte hain aur baki aapka jo lead wala specification wagera google pe hi hai waise copy paste hi kar dijiyega jo bhi hai.
Executive: Kya batana hai sir aap kis mein kya hai?
Customer: Google mein hi utha ke copy paste kar dijiyega.
Executive: Achcha. Nahi aapne dekho data to dala hai lekin specifications google se matlab kisi bhi product ka google se main le lu specification.
Customer: Haan haan bas haan itna kaun sa pura padhna hota hai ki ye cheez hai wo cheez hai.
Executive: Achcha achcha. Thik hai main ek bar check kar le rahi hu. Baki ek bar main aapne jo concern not relevant wala bola hai na main ek bar wo bhi unko bhej deti hu fir aapko update karti hu iske regarding. Unko boliye ki ek ek bar mere ko agar wo bol rahe hain 143 unko boliye 10 dikha de mujhe gym setup service ki not relevant hai to fir main jo bolenge wo. Sir main jute kya aa rahe the chappal kya aa rahe the to wo to hamare kaam ki line ki hai hi nahi.
Customer: Haan to sir dekho wahi to main jaise aapke pass bola tha ki bhai isko not relevant kar diya kijiyega to ye nahi show hoga wahan pe other dalna hai. Unhone bataya to sahi hai lekin wo galat section mein chala gaya tha but isme ek cheez aur aapko suggest karu main agar aapke pass repeatedly koi product aisa hai jisme aap deal hi nahi kar rahe ho but aapke pass aa raha hai to aap itna not mark karne ke bajay aap usko sidhe block kar sakte ho aapke kuch product pehle bhi block kare hain IndiaMART mein jo setting ka option hota hai na niche setting mein bylead preferences ek option hai block karne ka setting mein ek option aata hai bylead preferences ka to wahan pe aapne already apne kuch nau product mark kar rakhe hain block mein aapka olympic weight plate hai manual home treadmill hai motorized home treadmill hai to us tarah se aap wahan pe bhi is tarah ki irrelevant products ko mark kar doge to next time se aayega hi nahi to aapko bar bar not relevant nahi mark karna padega.
Executive: Chalega na.
Customer: Haan baki main ek bar team se dikhati hu fir aapko main call karti hu aur suniye ek cheez aur aap apni team se boliye ki meanwhile na tab tak aap apne usme check karte rahiye thoda time ke according kyunki time abhi latest mein aapka November mein improve hua hai. Team ne ye cheez to abhi nahi dekhi hai but time bhi agar wo dekhenge to is cheez ke liye wahan pe update mujhe bhejenge to time bhi unse boliye team se apni ki dekhe aur trade.inmart.com ka main link bhej rahi hu. Unko boliye ki usme beech beech mein check karte rahe. Thik hai?
Executive: Thik hai thik hai.
Customer: Haan main aapko baki whatsapp pe bhej rahi hu link wo jo aapko bataya maine.
Executive: Thik hai thik hai.
Customer: Thik hai. Okay sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer marked many leads as not relevant.

- Leads are not visible on the portal.

- Product score is at 54%, should be 80+.



Resolution:

- Executive explained about irrelevant leads marking.

- Executive shared details to improve product score.

- Executive suggested blocking irrelevant products.

- Executive shared link to check and update details.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will share details with the team.

- Executive will call the customer back.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, not relevant, product score, blocking
